#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

//catalan numbers
/*unsigned long int f(int n, int r)
{
	unsigned long int ans=1;
	if(r>n-r)
		r=n-r;
	for(int i=0; i<r; i++)
	{
		ans=((ans*(n-i))/(i+1))%10000;
	}
	return ans;
}

int main()
{
	int t, n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		n--;
		cout<<(f(2*n, n)/(n+1))%10000<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}*/

int main()
{
	int t;
	unsigned long int v[1000], n, i;
	cin>>t;
	v[0]=v[1]=1;
	for(i=2; i<1000; i++)
	{
		v[i]=0;
		for(int j=0; j<i; j++)
		{
			v[i]+=v[j]*v[i-j-1];
			v[i]%=10000;
		}
	}
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		n--;
		cout<<v[n]%10000<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
